arabic.title: يا مصطفى يا مصطفى
text: Quand je t'ai vu sur le balcon
Tu m'as dit monte et ne fais pas d' façon
Quand je t'ai vu sur le balcon
Tu m'as dit monte et ne fais pas d' façon
Tu m'as allumé avec une allumette
Et tu m'as fait perdre la tête

english.title: Oh Mostafa, Oh Mostafa
text: We've spent 7 years at the Attareen1
And go around from neighbor to neighbor
And whenever someone feels like it
then he'd smoke as much as he wants4
We've spent 7 years at the Attareen1
When I saw you on the balcony
you said: "climb up and don't make a fuss about it"
When I saw you on the balcony
you said: "climb up and don't make a fuss about it"
We've spent 7 years at the Attareen1
You lit me up with a match
and you made me lose my head

english.title: ya mostafa ya mostafa
text: seven years in Attareen ( It's a district in egypt )
among the lovers and the blamers
come on mostafa let us get everything back
and get back our wishes with love and tenderness
come on mostafa let us get everything back
and get back our wishes with love and tenderness
and we come back like before , before ( like the past, the past )
my heart with your love is satisfied , satisfied
seven years in Attareen ( It's a district in egypt )
among the lovers and the blamers
